bill.summary:
Assisting Narcotics and Trafficking Officers in Interdicting (ANTI) Drugs Act
This bill amends the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to establish Operation Stonegarden in the Department of Homeland Security to provide grants to law enforcement agencies to enhance border security.
Additionally, the bill reauthorizes through FY2023 the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas program and the Community Oriented Policing Services program.
